name: Luna  Shattered Hearts  Episode 1
blurb: Confront your dark past, climb out of the deepest pit, \nfind love, and go to war for a tyrannized tribe teetering on extinction.

rewards.reward: Tiny is Awesome! - $1 gets you into the Beta. I will personally whisper a silent thank you for every one at this amount!  Really.. Thanks.

Double Trouble! - $5 gets you into the Beta and your name in the credits as a Backer.  You will receive my Wallpaper Pack too. You will also get my undying gratitude!  Truly incredible.  Thank you!  The Lunaverse is stirring.

Level Headed Warrior! - This gets you into Beta and gets you access to Luna Shattered Hearts Episode 1 when it is released on Gillisgames.com! This is what you want! All subsequent rewards get this one, too!

Future's Song! - You get the Beta. You get the Finished Game on GillisGames.com, You get access to Future Episodes (Ep 2 and Ep 3), and you get a downloadable version of the soundtrack composed by Dan Reynolds (Rough Estimate is June 2013). Enjoy Luna in your Mp3 Player on the go!  All subsequent rewards get this one, too!

Patron Package (Updated to also include OS X!!)- All of the above and Downloadable Versions of each Episode that is released. (Playable on PC and OS X) Please note Current Beta is Web only! All subsequent rewards get this one, too!

Team Sound Track! - You're going to get all of the above plus a physical version of the soundtrack signed by Dan Reynolds!  Enjoy Luna on your drive to work, long walks on the beach, or anywhere you go! This is going to be worth the wait and highly collectible! All subsequent rewards get this one, too!

GILLIS T-Shirt Squad! - This is where the coolest of the cool hang out.  Get all of the above and a Gillis T-shirt (Please note my design is only conceptual at this point) I will be sending out a survey later to get sizes.  You only need to specify size on purchase if you are doing the Paypal option.  All subsequent rewards get this one, too!

Native Heart! - All of the above and one of my hand made arrowheads.  This is my other hobby but it fits nicely with Luna because you can find arrowheads in Luna the game too. Mine are replicas I made of local material. I have 12 that I am setting aside for Luna.  Some of them are large and some of them are small but all have their own unique characteristics.  One lucky person will be getting a rare fluted Clovis point that I made! Luna is all about adventure!

Designer Pro - Everyone in this group gets to create a rare drop treasure item that will be randomly dropped by various creatures throughout the game and can be sold in the Shop for big bucks.  Put on your thinking cap... These items are going to be the most sought after treasures in all of the Lunaverse! I will let you decide what creature or boss. A few examples of innate items could be a black opal gemstone, intricate coral phylactery, pink-white diamond core, Jasper Heart necklace, or whatever you dream up!

Order of the Raven - You get it all! You will receive all of the above plus a you will be receiving a high quality original Luna print that I will personally be signing and writing mushy letters on.  You will appear in the credits under "Order of the Raven Backers".  If you would rather remain anonymous that's OK too just let me know. Thank you guys!!!

The Raven - Wow. I am too speechless to speak.  You will receive all of the above and you will be able to name the main city the characters are heading to in Episode 1. If you want we can hang out or chat on the phone.  (Denver Area only For Hang Out)  You will have first dibs on your desired user name on the forums once the GillisGames.com website is built. I really want to talk to you.  You are the salt of the Earth.  A million Thanks!!. :)
